p: Geographic distribution of dengue deaths in mainland China from 1990 to 2019 is represented in Fig. 3. According to Fig. 3 and Table 1, a total of 4 provinces reported deaths from dengue, namely Guangdong Province, Zhejiang Province, Henan Province, and Hunan Province. Guangdong Province reported a total of 11 deaths from dengue, which occurred in 1991 (3 deaths), 2014 (6 deaths), 2017 (2 deaths), and 2019 (3 deaths). In 2001, 2005, and 2018, Zhejiang Province, Henan Province, and Hunan Province, respectively, experienced 1 death of dengue. This is almost consistent with the peak incidence of dengue fever.
